articles.title: Cowboy e-bikes now navigate you around air pollution - The Verge
articles.description: Electric bike maker Cowboy has added a new air quality feature to its iOS and Android apps that can choose the fastest or healthiest route to a destination. The Breezometer data claims to be accurate at a data resolution of just 5 meters.
